actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to provide for a minimum annual payment to municipalities for providing services and facilities to Indian assisted public housing.

summary.text: Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make specified payments to municipalities providing Indian public housing with related services and facilities (roads, water, electricity).

titles.title: A bill to amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to provide for a minimum annual payment to municipalities for providing services and facilities to Indian assisted public housing.
